kja6j683Text: Baune BT et al. 20181
kja6j684Text:
A network meta-analysis comparing effects of various antidepressant classes on the
DSST as a measure of cognitive dysfunction in patients with MDD.
kja6j685Text:
Study objective: Assess the comparative effect of a variety of antidepressants on
cognitive dysfunction, as measured by DSST, in patients with MDD through a systematic
literature review and a network meta-analysis (NMA).
kja6j686Text:
12 randomised
controlled trials:
• Katona et al 2012
kja6j687Text:
• Mahableshwarkar et al 2014
• McIntyre et al 2014
kja6j688Text:
• Raskin et al 2014
• Robinson et al 2014
kja6j689Text:
• Hoffman et al 2008
• Culang et al 2009
kja6j68aText:
• Dube et al 2010
• Georgotas et al 1989
kja6j68bText:
• Newhouse et al 2000
• Bondareff et al 2000
kja6j68kText:
Vs. placebo or another
active comparison
kja6j68lText: Meta-analysis was limited to adults aged ≥18 years of age with MDD.
kja6j68mText: A systematic review and network meta-analysis was conducted using a random n effects model.
Brintellix_846faa55aa: 1. Baune BT et al. Int J Neuropsychopharmacol 2018;21:97-107.
